whatIDo.title: What I do
whatIDo.speech: I’m a passionate FullStack Developer focused on building clean, efficient, and scalable solutions. Here’s how I can help:

cardFront.title: Frontend Development
cardFront.speech: I build responsive, accessible interfaces using React, React Native, or .NET (MVC/Razor), focusing on performance and great user experience. I use reusable components and modern libraries for fast, effective solutions.

cardBack.title: Backend Development
cardBack.speech: Designing and developing RESTful APIs using Python (Django Rest Framework) and .NET Core. Managing data models, business logic, and secure authentication systems. Integrating databases like PostgreSQL, MySQL, and SQL Server.

cardDeploy.title: Deployment & DevOps
cardDeploy.speech: Deploying applications to platforms like Vercel, Netlify, and Azure. Using Git and GitHub for version control and collaborative development. Automating workflows with GitHub Actions for CI/CD pipelines and reliable deployments.

skills.title: My Skills
skills.speech: Solid knowledge of a versatile set of technologies to face any challenge.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.speech: I love building in my free time, it’s how I learn and create with curiosity and passion.

stepOne.title: Understand the Idea
stepOne.speech: I take time to understand the goal, the user’s needs, and the core problem. This sets the direction for everything that follows.

stepTwo.title: Plan & Structure
stepTwo.speech: I outline the flow, define key features, and choose the right tools. This helps avoid confusion later and keeps development smooth.

stepThree.title: Build with Care
stepThree.speech: I code with attention to detail, aiming for clarity, scalability, and performance — always keeping the user experience in mind.

stepFour.title: Test, Launch, Improve
stepFour.speech: I test thoroughly, get feedback, and launch. After release, I monitor, adjust, and improve the project to keep it sharp and functional.
